languages.text: "Астропаты редко умирают от старости, Ваша Светлость. Разве что таковой можно назвать неумолимое истощение жизненных сил на службе. Чаще варп забирает нас своими жестокими способами, и я... терял товарищей". {n}Хормейстер устало потирает переносицу.{/n}

"Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Астропаты редко умирают от старости, Ваша Светлость. Разве что таковой можно назвать неумолимое истощение жизненных сил на службе. Чаще варп забирает нас своими жестокими способами, и я... терял товарищей". {n}Хормейстер устало потирает переносицу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}The Choirmaster rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}The Choirmaster rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

"Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

languages.text: «Los Astrópatas no suelen morir por causas naturales, mi{mf|lord|lady}. A menos que consideremos el desgaste inexorable que nuestro servicio inflige en nuestra fuerza vital una causa natural. Habitualmente, la disformidad nos consume con su habitual crueldad, y he... perdido así a muchos de mis compañeros». {n}Se lleva la mano a la frente en señal de cansancio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los Astrópatas no suelen morir por causas naturales, mi{mf|lord|lady}. A menos que consideremos el desgaste inexorable que nuestro servicio inflige en nuestra fuerza vital una causa natural. Habitualmente, la disformidad nos consume con su habitual crueldad, y he... perdido así a muchos de mis compañeros». {n}Se lleva la mano a la frente en señal de cansancio.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下、感応通信官が老衰で死ぬことは滅多にないのだ。仕事で生命力の消耗が避けられないことを、ある種の老いと捉えるなら話は別だがね。大抵の場合は、<歪み>に残酷なやり方で襲われて命を落とす。そして私は…多くの仲間を失った」{n}彼は疲れた様子で鼻の中央をこする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、感応通信官が老衰で死ぬことは滅多にないのだ。仕事で生命力の消耗が避けられないことを、ある種の老いと捉えるなら話は別だがね。大抵の場合は、<歪み>に残酷なやり方で襲われて命を落とす。そして私は…多くの仲間を失った」{n}彼は疲れた様子で鼻の中央をこする。{/n}

languages.text: “星语者很少能安然活到晚年，大人，除非有人觉得生命力衰竭造成的早衰也算是‘晚年’。更多时候，我们都会由于亚空间的力量而惨死。至于我……我失去了许多同伴。”{n}他揉着鼻梁，看起来疲惫不堪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “星语者很少能安然活到晚年，大人，除非有人觉得生命力衰竭造成的早衰也算是‘晚年’。更多时候，我们都会由于亚空间的力量而惨死。至于我……我失去了许多同伴。”{n}他揉着鼻梁，看起来疲惫不堪。{/n}

languages.text: "Astropathen sterben selten an Altersschwäche, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es sei denn, man betrachtet die unerbittliche Schwächung unserer Lebenskraft, die mit unserem Dienst einhergeht, als eine Art Altern. Meist aber kostet uns der Warp auf die ihm eigene grausame Weise das Leben, und ich habe viele ... viele Kameraden verloren." {n}Er reibt sich die Nase und sieht plötzlich sehr erschöpft aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Astropathen sterben selten an Altersschwäche, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es sei denn, man betrachtet die unerbittliche Schwächung unserer Lebenskraft, die mit unserem Dienst einhergeht, als eine Art Altern. Meist aber kostet uns der Warp auf die ihm eigene grausame Weise das Leben, und ich habe viele ... viele Kameraden verloren." {n}Er reibt sich die Nase und sieht plötzlich sehr erschöpft aus.{/n}

languages.text: « Les astropathes meurent rarement de vieillesse, Votre Seigneurie. À moins que l'on considère l'usure inexorable induite par notre tâche comme une forme de vieillissement prématuré. La plupart du temps, nous succombons aux effets délétères du Warp, et... c'est ainsi que j'ai perdu bon nombre de camarades. » {n}Il se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les astropathes meurent rarement de vieillesse, Votre Seigneurie. À moins que l'on considère l'usure inexorable induite par notre tâche comme une forme de vieillissement prématuré. La plupart du temps, nous succombons aux effets délétères du Warp, et... c'est ainsi que j'ai perdu bon nombre de camarades. » {n}Il se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n}

languages.text: "Astropatlar, nadiren yaşlılıktan ölürler {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Hizmetimizin, yaşam gücümüzü yaşlılık misali merhamet bilmeden kuruttuğunu saymazsak elbette. Gaddar yöntemleriyle canımızı alan, sıklıkla öteboyut olur ve ben... Pek çok meslektaşımı kaybettim." {n}Burun kemiğini ovuşturuyor. Bitkin görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Astropaths seldom die of old age, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Unless one thinks of the inexorable drain our service is on our life forces as an old age of sorts. More often, the warp claims us in its cruel ways, and I have... lost many a fellow." {n}He rubs the bridge of his nose, looking tired.{/n}
